summary.span: 定義 控制項中資料項目與其所繫結之功能表項目之間的關聯性。

span.span: Defines the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to in a control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個欄位 （例如 XML 項目具有多個屬性），如果沒有功能表項目繫結所定義，功能表項目會顯示所傳回的值`ToString()`方法預設的資料項目。When the control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), if no menu item bindings are defined, a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default. 在 XML 項目，功能表項目會顯示項目名稱，顯示的功能表的基礎結構，但沒有很有用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu, but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以藉由指定功能表項目繫結，功能表項目的屬性繫結至特定欄位。You can bind the properties of a menu item to a specific field by specifying menu item bindings. A物件會定義每個資料項目及它所繫結功能表項目之間的關聯性。A object defines the relationship between each data item and the menu item it is binding to. > [!NOTE] > 當控制項繫結至控制項中，功能表項目繫結會有任何作用。When the control is bound to a control, menu item bindings have no effect. 使用自動站台地圖提供者執行繫結。Binding is performed automatically using the site map provider. 控制存放區及其中的物件屬性及套用繫結至資料來源建立功能表階層和資料來源階層之間的一對一關聯性。The control stores its objects in the property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the menu hierarchy and the data source hierarchy. 在資料來源中，每個資料項目控制項嘗試比對的資料項目物件以建立對應物件。For each data item in the data source, the control attempts to match the data item to a object to create the corresponding object. 建立時物件，您必須指定繫結準則。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 功能表項目應該繫結資料的項目時，就會指出準則。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item. 您可以指定、 ，或兩者。You can specify the , the , or both. 功能表項目深度指定取得繫結的功能表層級。A menu item depth specifies the menu level that gets bound. 例如，下列宣告的資料來源的名稱和識別碼欄位繫結和屬性，分別的深度為 0 的所有節點：For example, the following declaration binds the Name and ID fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 資料成員基礎資料來源中，指定資料的項目類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 每個資料來源中的項目階層式資料 (由物件) 會公開屬性，指定資料的項目類型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by an object) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，資料成員的 XML 項目會指定項目的名稱。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 當資料來源包含多個資料項目類型時，資料成員會指定哪些資料的項目類型使用。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 下列宣告繫結``的項目控制項功能表中，不論在階層中位置的所有功能表項目：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the menu items in the menu, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 有時候您可能需要建立指定深度和資料成員的功能表項目繫結。Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member. 這很常用資料來源包含具有相同的資料成員值的不同層級項目時。This is often used when the data source contains items at different levels that have the same data member value. 例如，您可以有``顯示在不同的層級的 XML 檔中的項目。For example, you can have `` elements that appear at different levels within an XML file. 下列宣告顯示如何指定功能表項目繫結套用至相同的資料成員在不同的功能表深度：The following declarations show how to specify menu item bindings that apply to identical data members at different menu depths: `` `` 如果功能表項目繫結定義的深度和資料成員沒有，功能表項目繫結會套用至功能表內的所有功能表項目。If a menu item binding is defined without a depth and a data member, the menu item binding is applied to all menu items within the menu. 這通常用於資料的所有項目具有相同的屬性，而且應該相同，顯示，不論功能表深度。This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth. 建立繫結準則後，您就可以繫結的屬性值可繫結的物件。After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 當繫結至靜態值，所有物件的物件套用共用相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. 繫結至欄位的屬性包含對應的欄位從資料來源的值。Properties bound to fields contain the values of the corresponding field from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫中的繫結的屬性藉由直接設定的對應屬性的物件。You can selectively override a bound property in a object by setting the corresponding property directly. 下表列出的屬性類別可讓您將屬性繫結資料項目欄位的物件。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a field of a data item. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| 下表列出的屬性類別可讓您將屬性繫結成靜態值的物件。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a static value. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| 如果衝突的會定義物件，控制項適用於功能表項目繫結，以下列順序的優先順序：If conflicting objects are defined, the control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 物件定義，並相符項目深度和資料成員。The object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member. 2. 物件，定義並比對資料成員。The object that defines and matches the data member only. 3. 物件，定義並符合只的深度。The object that defines and matches the depth only. 4. 深度和資料成員都不會定義的物件。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. （這種類型的功能表項目繫結套用至功能表中的所有功能表項目）。(This type of menu item binding is applied to all menu items in the menu.) 5. 資料來源中沒有相符的物件。The object that does not have a match in the data source. 在此情況下，所傳回的值`ToString()`資料項目的方法則繫結到和的功能表項目的屬性物件套用。In this case, the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item is then bound to the and properties of the menu items to which the object is applied. 類別也可讓您藉由設定顯示功能表項目中將文字格式化屬性。The class also allows you to format the text displayed in a menu item by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件定義的欄位之間的關聯性控制項和功能表項目在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects to define the relationship between the fields of an control and the menu items in a control. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Menu.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來設定屬性物件。Use the property to set the property of a object. 這項設定會與所有功能表項目来共用物件套用。This setting is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 當這個屬性設定為`false`，已停用功能表項目，並顯示任何快顯影像，指出子項目。When this property is set to `false`, the menu item is disabled and no pop-out image that indicates child items is displayed. 此屬性設定為`false`功能表項目基本上可以讓此功能表項目的節點，其中沒有進一步的層級會顯示出該節點的結尾。Setting this property to `false` for a menu item essentially makes the menu item the end of that node, where no further levels are shown off of that node.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EnabledField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至欄位的名稱屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. > [!NOTE] > 您可以覆寫啟用個別的功能表項目藉由設定其直接屬性。You can override the enabling of an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果資料來源包含多個資料表或屬性，您必須先設定建立繫結準則屬性，屬性，或兩者。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定套用 物件之功能表項目文字的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 格式化字串，指定套用 之功能表項目文字的顯示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the is applied.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來提供自訂格式的功能表項目的文字。The property is used to provide a custom format for a menu item's text. 格式字串可以包含常值字串、 預留位置，或兩者。The format string can consist of a literal string, a placeholder, or both. 常值字串是逐字顯示，而該繫結至功能表項目的文字的值會取代預留位置。The literal string is displayed verbatim, while the placeholder is replaced with the value that is bound to the menu item's text. 預留位置會分割為兩個部分，在表單中，以冒號分隔的 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder is split into two parts, separated by a colon, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 例如，{0: f2 顯示定點包含兩個小數位數。For example, {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 預留位置字串必須括在大括號來表示其為一個預留位置，而不是常值字串中。The placeholder string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a placeholder and not a literal string. 大括號以外的任何文字會顯示為常值文字。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 遵循標準格式字串的語法，使用冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定的參數索引。Keeping to the standard formatting string syntax, the value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. 因為只有一個值可以顯示每個功能表項目中，參數索引可以是只能設為 0。Because only one value can be displayed in each menu item, the parameter index can be set only to 0. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定值的顯示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式來顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示十六進位字元指定的大小寫。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來格式化顯示的功能表項目中的文字控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the text displayed in the menu items of a control. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Menu.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼是前述範例的範例網站對應資料。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至自訂的影像 URL屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the URL of a custom image to bind to the property of a object. 此映像會與所有共用物件的物件套用。This image is shared with all objects to which the object is applied. 影像功能表項目的文字旁邊會顯示，只要用戶端瀏覽器支援的格式可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等）。The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 您可以藉由設定覆寫個別的功能表項目的影像其直接屬性。You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 不使用這個屬性在每個功能表項目中顯示相同的映像，您也可以使用要繫結屬性屬性物件資料來源的欄位。Instead of using this property to display the same image in each menu item, you can also use the property to bind the property of a object to a field of a data source. 進行轉譯時，屬性的每個功能表項目的物件套用包含該欄位的對應值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定功能表項目的文字旁邊顯示影像的 URL。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to an image to display next to the text of the menu items. 中的每個功能表項目會顯示這個影像物件套用。This image is displayed in each menu item to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Menu.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至欄位的名稱屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. 進行轉譯時，屬性的每個功能表項目的物件套用包含該欄位的對應值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. 每個功能表項目會顯示的影像對應的 URL。The image at the corresponding URL is displayed for each menu item. > [!NOTE] > 您可以藉由設定覆寫個別的功能表項目的 URL 其直接屬性。You can override the URL for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果資料來源包含多個資料表或屬性，您必須先設定建立繫結準則屬性，屬性，或兩者。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. 而不是使用這個屬性來繫結屬性物件欄位中，您也可以繫結它為靜態值藉由設定屬性。Instead of using this property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the property. 這可讓您瀏覽至相同的 URL，其中每個功能表項目從物件套用。This allows you to navigate to the same URL from each menu item to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence.

summary.span: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架，在其中顯示與套用 物件之功能表項目相關聯的 Web 網頁內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 在其中顯示連結 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，以顯示 Web 內容會連結至功能表項目，按一下該功能表項目時。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性會覆寫屬性控制項的功能表項目的物件套用。Setting this property overrides the property of the control for the menu items to which the object is applied. 您可以選擇性地覆寫這個屬性設定直接每個功能表項目的屬性。You can selectively override this property by setting the property of each menu item directly. 目標值必須以字母的 A 到 Z 範圍 （不區分大小寫） 下表所示，以底線開頭的某些特殊值以外的開頭。Target values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 `_search` 目標值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 請勿設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出為物件必須是 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以指定要在其中顯示 Web 內容在按下該功能表項目時，功能表項目與相關聯的視窗。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the window in which to display the Web content associated with a menu item, when that menu item is clicked. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Menu.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼是前述範例的範例網站對應資料。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至文字屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the text to bind to the property of a object. 此文字會顯示在功能表項目，與所有功能表項目来共用物件套用。This text is displayed in a menu item and is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 您可以藉由設定覆寫個別的功能表項目的文字其直接屬性。You can override the text for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 不使用這個屬性來顯示每個功能表項目相同的文字，您也可以繫結屬性藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件屬性。Instead of using this property to display the same text in each menu item, you can also bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 進行轉譯時，屬性的每個功能表項目的物件套用包含該欄位的對應值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 您無法建立空的節點中藉由設定控制或屬性為空字串 ("")。You cannot create empty nodes in a control by setting the or properties to the empty string (""). 為空字串中設定這些屬性具有未設定屬性相同的效果。Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties. 在此情況下，控制項可讓您建立使用預設繫結屬性。In that case, the control creates a default binding using the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示功能表項目中的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display in a menu item. 此文字會顯示的每個功能表項目中物件套用。This text is displayed in each menu item to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Menu.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至欄位的名稱屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. 進行轉譯時，屬性的每個功能表項目的物件套用包含該欄位的對應值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. 此文字會顯示在功能表項目。This text is displayed in the menu items. > [!NOTE] > 您可以藉由設定覆寫個別的功能表項目的文字其直接屬性。You can override the text for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果資料來源包含多個資料表或屬性，您必須先設定建立繫結準則屬性，屬性，或兩者。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. 您無法建立空的節點中藉由設定控制或屬性為空字串 ("")。You cannot create empty nodes in a control by setting the or properties to the empty string (""). 為空字串中設定這些屬性具有未設定屬性相同的效果。Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties. 在此情況下，控制項可讓您建立使用預設繫結屬性。In that case, the control creates a default binding using the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). 而不是使用這個屬性來繫結屬性物件欄位中，您也可以繫結它為靜態值藉由設定屬性。Instead of using this property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the property. 這可讓您的每個功能表項目中顯示相同的文字物件套用。This allows you to display the same text in each menu item to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ##
